::Killfest/Scyther::

Killfest frowns as DrillBit walks out.

"I think Dollen and Goldeneye should stay with DarkMouse. She's too 
valuable to lose, and Megatron's troops could be all over the ship."

He gives another command to one of his troops (over the internal 
comm). Scyther changes course, entering Darkmouse's room, still 
cloaked.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Darkmouse nods and taps a few buttons, trying to figure out how many 
troops there are ont he bridge.

(Are there any troops on the bridge?)





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> All his wapons are on stand by.
> "No one seems to know. StarScream, Dollon, your my team. Goldeneye, 
your
> Killfests. There should be more of are troops there if they listen 
to
> orders. Dark Mouse try to get a estimate of how many enemys we can
> expect."
> He walks out heading for the Bridg.
> 
> ::Dollon::
> 
> He follows.
